description: Succelent calamari with a light crinkled coating.
name: Calamari with Garlic Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Shallow fry the battered calamari for 4 minutes and then place on a plate with kitchen towel to drain some excess oil before serving with the garlic mayonnaise.
